title: Learn Finnish Verbs | 'Type 3 Min√§ Verbs' | Verbityyppi 3 (Part 1)

media:group.media:title: Learn Finnish Verbs | 'Type 3 Min√§ Verbs' | Verbityyppi 3 (Part 1)
media:group.media:description:
Continuing with verbs today. This is part 1 of my "Learning Finnish Type 3 Verbs" Series!üòä

This video kick starts the so called 'Type 3 verbs/Verbityyppi 3' in Finnish. I will first explain what types of verbs belong to the verb type 3 category and then I will be going over the verb conjugations for when you are talking about yourself, so "Min√§/M√§ __(verb type 3)__". 
Following videos will go over the rest of the pronouns!

A summary: 
‚óè Verbs belonging to verbityyppi 3 end in: -lla/-ll√§, -sta/-st√§, -nna/-nn√§, -ra/-r√§
‚óè To talk about yourself using the min√§ form, remove the LAST 2 letters of the verb, add -e and add the min√§ marker -n
‚óè I didn't show an example in this video, but consonant gradation CAN happen. So don't be too shocked if you come across this when practicing (more on this in another video)


More videos on the topic: 
‚óè Finnish Type 1 Verbs Introduction: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fepo5p9Qhto&list=PLRT3b6lFfYD_vMpmb9Rdi177dJ9pslNkL&index=4
‚óè Finnish Type 2 Verbs Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bhj3CTFrUeM
‚óèType 3 Verbs Part 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XYpXN53YiNQ&ab_channel=KatChatsFinnish

~~~~~~~~~ANSWERS~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. K√§vell√§ (to walk) - k√§vel - k√§vele - k√§velen - (min√§/m√§) K√§velen (I walk)
2. Py√∂r√§ill√§ (to ride a bike) - py√∂r√§il - py√∂r√§ile - py√∂r√§ilen - (min√§/m√§) Py√∂r√§ilen (I bike)
3. Pest√§ (to wash) - pes - pese - pesen - (min√§/m√§) Pesen (I wash)
